title: OneNutS
author: OneNutS
created_time: October 16, 2023, 07:20:21 AMLast edit: December 14, 2023, 05:37:44 AM by OneNutS
content: Zororium – A Playground of Potential for Cryptocurrency InvestmentZororium, a highly promising project in the realm of cryptocurrency investment, proudly introduces the Zoro Token cryptocurrency. With a total supply of 100 billion tokens divided into three strategic phases, it sets forth an anticipated value-growth journey.Going through 3 phases of issuance, Zororium will have a strong financial cycle to establish Zororium’s Enma Swap trading network. We are in the phase of building a large enough community and accepting the liquidity of Zororium Coin, which will set the stage for growth and profit for early sponsors of the project. Zororium is built on the Blockchain platform of Ethereum, integrating AI ChatGPT-4 technology, which will contribute to promoting community trust and Zororium’s applicability in life. ZoroSwap provides users with liquidity for buying and selling digital and technology products. Transactions will be audited and publicly reported by CERTIK to increase transparency and clarity for the long-term development community. More details on the website:  https://zorotoken.io/   ● Bounty Campaign Dates: October 16 - November 12  lasts for 4 weeks.● Tokens will be distributed to participants within 1 month after the end of the Bounty Campaign.● Weekly stakes! Do tasks every week, make reports every week, and get stakes every week!● Tokens will be distributed to participants within 1 month after the end of the Bounty Campaign in the registration Email on Coinsbit ( https://coinsbit.io )● Join ZRT on social media:- Telegram - Twitter- Medium- Linkedin- TikTok● You will receive stakes for performing certain actions, after the end of the bounty campaign, the stakes will be converted into tokens, according to the formula (total number of tokens/total number of stakes)*number of your stakes.● Please read the terms and conditions carefully. For non-compliance, even minor, you will not receive stakes or will be excluded from the bounty program.● Use of multi-accounts, spam, bots and other is strictly forbidden, all attempts will be banned.● Bounty managers reserve the right to change the conditions of the bounty campaign. ● Make reports in a separate post every week. DO NOT QUOTE YOUR OLD REPORT🙏!● Please, read the terms carefully. For non-compliance with requirements, you will not get stakes or be excluded from the bounty program. Follow all updates in this thread and Telegram chats: ZRT Bounty,  ZRT Chat , Aladdin Center●  Format for proof of authentication post:Code: Proof of authentication:- Coinsbit registration Email: ( https://coinsbit.io )- Telegram Username:- Campaigns applied for:* Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.Bounty campaign reward pool: 133 000 000 ZRT tokens will be distributed through this bounty campaign. * Bounty Aladdin Center has escrowed and guarantees the reward distribution of this bounty.  Rewards dislocation:● Video:  20%● Medium:  20%● Twitter : 25%● Telegram: 25%● Reserve fund - 10%Rewards:  Rewards for YouTube:● Excellent: 4 stakes (High quality video and >4000 subscribers)● High: 3 stakes (Good quality video and >2000 subscribers )● Good: 2 stakes (Average quality video and >1000 subscribers)● Average: 1 stake (Average quality video and >400 subscribers)Rewards for TikTok:● Excellent: 4 stakes (High quality video, over 200 likes, 20 comments and >4000 subscribers)● High: 3 stakes (Good quality video, 100 likes, 20 comments and >2000 followers).● Good: 2 stakes (Average quality video, 50 likes, 10 comments and >1000 followers).● Average: 1 stake (Average quality video, 10 likes, 2 comments, and >400 followers).Rules:  ● Join ZRT on social media:- Telegram - Twitter- Medium- Linkedin- TikTok● Each participant can send:                                             - YouTube - 4 videos ( No more than  1  video a week )                                            - Tiktok - 4 videos ( No more than 1 video a week )● Participant's account should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the video campaign and have at least 300 subscribers.● The video on YouTube description must include 70+ words of original text about the company Zororium● TikTok videos should be no longer than 30 seconds, match tiktok trends and styles● You must have at least (minimum) 100 views under your video to get the stakes● Please note, if the video has 0 views it will be rated at 0 stakes!● Content topics:  -  Information can be used from social networks:  https://zorotoken.io/  https://zorotoken.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/Zororium-EBOOKwhitepaper.pdf   and use hashtags: #comiccoin #zrt #comictrend● Only original video content will be accepted. Copy from the project website, YouTube channels or from others' work will be rejected.● Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered.● High engagements but poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.● Videos should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.● All videos need to have a link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.● Please provide enough details of the bounty hunter at the end of the video to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!● By joining this program, all participants accept that the project's team can use all these videos as marketing materials.● Article and Video submission form will be closed 3 days before the end of the bounty.● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  ZRT Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:  1. Join ZRT on social media:- Telegram - Twitter- Medium- Linkedin- TikTok3. Write a good video about ZRT  project4. Post it on your website, Tiktok, YouTube5. Submit it here:  * Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.Rewards:● Excellent: 4 stakes (Views and comments at least 100 likes/comments/upvotes or 500 claps would be taken note of.)● High: 3 stakes (Views and comments at least 40 likes/comments/upvotes or 300 claps would be taken note of.)● Good: 2 stakes (Views and comments at least 20 likes/comments/upvotes or 200 claps would be taken note of.)● Average: 1 stake (Views and comments at least 10 likes/comments/upvotes or 100 claps would be taken note of.)Rules:● Each participant can write 4 original  article only ( No more than 1 per week )● Articles should be quality and unique with a minimum of 500 words.● Views and comments at least 10 likes/comments/upvotes or 100 claps would be taken note of.● Participant's forum accounts should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the article campaign.● Articles should be published on blogs recommended by us: Steemit, Reddit, BitcoinTalk, Medium and LinkedIn and must be publicly accessible.Other high ranked blogs may be accepted.● In the description of a Article, you have to write 70+ words of original text about the company  https://zorotoken.io/   ● Content topics:Information can be used from social networks  https://zorotoken.io/  https://zorotoken.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/Zororium-EBOOKwhitepaper.pdf and use hashtags: #comiccoin #zrt #comictrend● Only quality and original content will be accepted. Articles should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.● Published Articles must include at least 2 images of the project, link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website, Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.● Please provide enough details of the writer at the end of the article to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!● By joining this program, all participants accept that the project's team can use all these articles as marketing materials● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  ZRT Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:1. Join ZRT on social media:- Telegram - Twitter- Medium- Linkedin- TikTok2. Write a good article about https://zorotoken.io/ project3. Post it on your website, Medium, LinkedIn, Steemit, Reddit, BitcoinTalk, etc.:4. Submit it here:  * Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.Rewards:● Have more than 300 followers: 1 stake per one tweet or retweet ● Have more than 1000 followers: 2 stake per one tweet or retweet● Have more than 3000 followers: 3 stake per one tweet or retweet ● Have more than 5000 followers: 4 stake per one tweet or retweet ● Have more than 10000 followers: 5 stake per one tweet or retweet Rules:● Must have at least 300 followers and make privacy settings open for your page.● Follow and like the official Twitter account● Make 1 post every day. Use information from official social networks.  Use hashtag #comiccoin #zrt #comictrend● Make 1 repost every day. Like a post when you make a repost. Use information from official social networks. Use hashtag #comiccoin #zrt #comictrend● Participants have to make 10 new tweets and 10 retweets per week (maximum 2 tweet and 2 retweet per day).● DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT ! ● Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked and deleted● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  ZRT Bounty, Aladdin Center● Please, post all the links to your work in this thread at the end of every week as a new post. Do not quote or edit your previous week report.How to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make reports every week using this format: Code:● Twitter Report ●- Week, Data: …. …- Twitter Profile:- Retweet Link #1:...- Retweet Link #2:...- Retweet Link #3:...- Retweet Link #4:...- Retweet Link #5:...- Tweet Link#1:...- Tweet Link#2:...- Tweet Link #3:...- Tweet Link #4:...- Tweet Link #5:...[/centvRewards:● 1 comment = 1 stakes (2 stakes/day)● 20 stakes once for wearing a “Your Name | ZRT” + LOGO.Rules:● Join  - Telegram● Make a maximum 10 comments per week. Make a maximum 2 comments per 1 day● Write at least 2 constructive messages per day in top exchange’s telegram groups (Example: Binance, Kucoin, Gate.io, MEXC etc). Posting messages on other groups won’t be counted.● DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT !● Write comments in a crypto related group, mentioning the Zororium● Continue the comment of the previous person. Your comment should flow into the dialogue and continue the person’s thought. ● It is forbidden to make meaningless and unconscious comments, spam. Comments like: Hi!, Hello!, Good project - will not be counted. Don't spam all comments in a row, don’t write  silly phrases! Spam and low quality will not be counted. ● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  ZRT Bounty, Aladdin Center● Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked and deleted.Name: Your name | ZRT Ambassador.Avatar: How to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make a weekly report in this thread using this format:Code: ● Telegram Report ●● Telegram Report ●- Week, Data: … …- Username link: (Example: https://t.me/username)- Telegram comments:- Comment Link #1:- Comment Link #2:- Comment Link #3:- Comment Link #4:- Comment Link #5:- Comment Link #6:- Comment Link #7:- Comment Link #8:- Comment Link #9:- Comment Link #10:* Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.
